definition: to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline

sentences.english: Thank god I no longer feel this erotic desire.
sentences.chinese: 感谢主，我已不再有性欲望了。

sentences.english: So Governor, thank you for your leadership on this bill.
sentences.chinese: 所以州长先生，感谢你在这项法案上起到的领导作用。

sentences.english: I should like to express my heartfelt gratitude for your gracious receptionhospitality.
sentences.chinese: 我愿向你们盛情的接待与款待表示衷心的感谢。

sentences.english: I will praise God's name in song and glorify him with thanksgiving.
sentences.chinese: 我要以诗歌赞美神的名，以感谢称他为大。

sentences.english: They are incredibly sturdy, thanks to the durability of their bamboo hulls.
sentences.chinese: 它们非常坚固，感谢竹船的耐用。

sentences.english: Thank hypocrisy, thanks to get away with parading falsehoods suddenly sincere lies.
sentences.chinese: 感谢虚伪突然诚恳，感谢谎言弄假成真。

sentences.english: Thank hypocrisy, thanks to get away with parading falsehoods suddenly sincere lies.
sentences.chinese: 感谢虚伪突然诚恳，感谢谎言弄假成真。

sentences.english: Thank the interviewer for taking the time to speak with you.
sentences.chinese: 对面试官花时间表示感谢。

sentences.english: Thanks to demonization of Hinduism by British lootersand their evangelists.
sentences.chinese: 感谢英国掠夺者及其布道者对印度教的妖魔化。

sentences.english: Thank you for calling Japan Airlines.
sentences.chinese: 感谢您打电话来日本航空公司。

sentences.english: You have bees to thank every time you drizzle some honey into your tea.
sentences.chinese: 每次在茶中滴入蜂蜜时你都要感谢蜜蜂的馈赠。

sentences.english: We thank many listeners who write to us and encourage us.
sentences.chinese: 很感谢有不少听友写信来给我们，鼓励我们。

sentences.english: The LORD finds us enough reasons for prayer, and we ought to thank Him that it is so.
sentences.chinese: 上帝乐意听我们的琐碎絮语，我们也该为此献上感谢。

sentences.english: Here, please allow me to send my gratitude to Madam Wang Liping and director Mr. Xia Xiaoyun.
sentences.chinese: 在这里，我要感谢王丽萍女士和夏晓昀导演。

sentences.english: Rest in peace Steve and thanks for everything.
sentences.chinese: 感谢乔布斯所做的一切，愿他安息。

sentences.english: We thank you for your order, which have be putted in work at once.
sentences.chinese: 感谢您的订单，我们立即予以执行。

definition: expression of gratitude/to give thanks/a thank-you note/acknowledgement
to express/to present/to extend/to tender (greetings, thanks etc)
to wish/to express good wishes/to pray/(old) wizard
